title: 01/05/21 - HOUR 3 - Daniel Jeremiah
itunes:title: 01/05/21 - HOUR 3 - Daniel Jeremiah
description:
Dan discusses the upcoming NFL Draft and the love fest around the league for quarterbacks. He also reacts live to the news about the Cleveland Browns COVID-19 situation. Daniel Jeremiah joins to discuss the needs for several teams looking towards the NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
